content.transcript:
Let's look at chilled food storage.

High-risk and perishable foods should always be stored under refrigeration to prevent most pathogenic bacteria from multiplying and to slow down the rate of spoilage.

Proper care should be taken to minimise potential hazards that might occur while using chilled food storage.
